item.title: 航运专家称，美国可能发生的海港罢工可能导致货物滞留数月
item.description: 航运专家周三表示，美国东海岸和墨西哥湾的海港可能发生罢工，这可能导致那里的货物运输倒退数周甚至数月。【原文：A potential strike at U.S. seaports on the East Coast and Gulf of Mexico could back up cargo there for weeks or even months, shipping experts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Equinor 和 Dominion 在美国中大西洋海上风电拍卖中胜出
item.description: 内政部周二表示，挪威 Equinor 公司和美国电力公司 Dominion 在美国政府对特拉华州、马里兰州和弗吉尼亚州沿海两个地区的海上风电拍卖中胜出。【原文：Norway's Equinor and U.S. power company Dominion were the winning bidders in a U.S. government offshore wind auction of two areas off the coasts of Delaware, Maryland and Virginia, the Interior Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 业界和托运人为加拿大铁路停运做好准备，担心 "灾难 "降临
item.description: 北美工业团体和托运人正在为加拿大两大铁路公司史无前例的同时停运做准备，这可能会造成价值数十亿美元的经济损失。【原文：North American industry groups and shippers are bracing for an unprecedented simultaneous stoppage at both of Canada's main railway companies that could inflict billions of dollars' worth of economic damage.】

item.title: 特朗普重返 X 国后，其媒体公司股价接近历史新低
item.description: 周三，美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司股价下跌，接近历史最低点，此前该公司的季度业绩疲软，这位共和党总统候选人重返社交媒体平台 X。【原文：Shares of former U.S. President Donald Trump's media company dipped and neared record lows on Wednesday, following weak quarterly results and the Republican presidential candidate's return to social media platform X.】

item.title: UAW 工会发起支持哈里斯运动，动员全美工人
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）周三表示，该组织正在全美范围内发起一项努力，动员其一百万名在职和退休工人在11月5日的大选中投票给卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris），为民主党人在关键的战场州提供潜在的助力。【原文：The United Auto Workers is launching a U.S-wide effort to mobilize its one million active and retired workers to vote for Kamala Harris in the Nov. 5 election, it said on Wednesday, offering the Democrat a potential boost in critical battleground states.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，J&J公司即将披露对滑石粉和解的支持情况
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士说，强生公司正准备在未来几天内公布一份价值 64.8 亿美元的报价，以解决数万起指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品致癌的法律诉讼，该报价得到了广泛的支持。【原文：Johnson & Johnson is preparing to unveil widespread support in coming days for a $6.48 billion offer to settle tens of thousands of legal actions alleging its Baby Powder and other talc products caused cancer, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 投资者关注基金的最新申报，科技股成为焦点
item.description: 投资者正在关注本周三提交的季度文件，以了解全球最大的几家基金管理公司在第二季度末的投资状况，在这一时期，标准普尔 500 指数（S&P 500）屡创历史新高，而在此之前，美国股市最近出现了一阵动荡。【原文：Investors are watching quarterly filings on Wednesday to get a glimpse at how some of the world’s biggest money managers were positioned at the end of the second quarter, a period marked by a series of record highs in the S&P 500 that preceded a more recent bout of turmoil in U.S. stocks.】

item.title: Shake Shack 和 Serve Robotics 在洛杉矶推出自动人行道机器人送餐服务
item.description: 快餐连锁店 Shake Shack 和 Serve Robotics 周三表示，两家公司将合作使用自动人行道机器人配送 Uber Eats 上的订单。【原文：Fast-food chain Shake Shack and Serve Robotics are partnering to use autonomous sidewalk robots to deliver orders placed on Uber Eats, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，礼来要求医生停止销售山寨减肥药
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，礼来公司最近几天向美国医疗服务提供商发出了停售函，要求他们停止推广山寨减肥药，因为该公司的药物Zepbound供应情况有所改善。【原文：Eli Lilly has sent cease-and-desist letters to US healthcare providers in recent days demanding they stop promoting copycat weight-loss drugs as the supply of the company's drug Zepbound improves, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大宗商品经纪商 Marex 计划进行更多收购；业绩公布后股价大涨
item.description: 英国大宗商品经纪商 Marex 集团首席执行官告诉路透社，在美国上市后，该公司正计划进行更多收购，以实现公司多元化。【原文：British-based commodities broker Marex Group is planning more acquisitions to diversify the company following a U.S. listing, its CEO told Reuters, in the wake of strong interim results that sent shares to a record high.】

item.title: 巴西参议院委员会再次推迟对央行金融自主权的投票
item.description: 巴西参议院的一个委员会周三再次推迟了对赋予中央银行金融自主权的修宪提案的投票，该提案得到了保守派议员的支持，但遭到了总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦的反对。【原文：A Brazilian Senate committee on Wednesday once again postponed a vote on a constitutional amendment proposal to grant financial autonomy to the central bank, which is backed by conservative lawmakers but opposed by President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva.】

item.title: 包装食品领域多年来的大手笔兼并
item.description: 士力架生产商玛氏公司周三表示，将以 359 亿美元的价格收购 Cheez-It 的所有者 Kellanova 公司，成为包装食品行业最大的交易之一。【原文：Snickers-maker Mars inked one of the biggest deals in the packaged food industry when it said it would buy Cheez-It owner Kellanova in a $35.9 billion deal on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，必和必拓与埃斯孔迪达煤矿罢工工会商讨转移阵地事宜
item.description: 一位知情人士周三表示，必和必拓智利埃斯孔迪达铜矿的罢工工会正在与管理层会面，看他们能否 "拉近立场"。【原文：The striking union at BHP's Escondida copper mine in Chile is meeting with management to see if they can "bring positions closer," said a source with knowledge of the matter on Wednesday.】

item.title: 好莱坞工会达成协议，让广告商用人工智能复制演员的声音
item.description: 好莱坞演员工会 SAG-AFTRA 周三宣布与在线艺人市场 Narrativ 达成协议，允许演员向广告商出售人工智能复制其声音的权利。【原文：The Hollywood actors' union SAG-AFTRA announced on Wednesday a deal with online talent marketplace Narrativ that enables actors to sell advertisers rights to replicate their voices with artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 全球最严重通胀缓解，疲惫的阿根廷人喜忧参半
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统的严厉紧缩政策下，阿根廷物价月涨幅跌至 4%，为两年多来的最低点，这让阿根廷人感到既充满希望又疲惫不堪。【原文：Argentines, feeling the pinch of the world's highest annual inflation rates, are feeling both hopeful and weary as monthly price rises dip down towards 4%, the lowest in over two years amid tough austerity under President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 纳尔逊-佩尔茨的特里安基金减持联合利华股份
item.description: 周三的一份文件显示，纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）的特里亚基金管理公司（Trian Fund Management）已经出售了约 380 万股英国消费品巨头联合利华（Unilever）的股票，总价近 1.81 亿英镑（约合 2.32 亿美元）。【原文：Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Management has sold about 3.8 million shares in British consumer goods giant Unilever for nearly 181 million pounds ($232 million), a filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: VIEW 不出所料的 7 月 CPI 支持美联储的通货紧缩设想
item.description: 7 月份美国消费价格如期反弹，但趋势仍与通胀减弱一致，并未改变美联储下月降息的预期。【原文：U.S. consumer prices rebounded as expected in July, but the trend remained consistent with subsiding inflation and did not change expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 美国 7 月消费者价格如期上涨
item.description: 7 月份美国消费价格如期反弹，但趋势仍与通胀减弱一致，并未改变美联储下月降息的预期。【原文：U.S. consumer prices rebounded as expected in July, but the trend remained consistent with subsiding inflation and did not change expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 全球航空燃油消费放缓加剧石油需求担忧
item.description: 随着消费者支出放缓对旅行预算造成影响，全球航空燃油需求将趋于疲软，这种变化可能会在未来几个月对油价造成压力。【原文：Global jet fuel demand is poised to soften as a slowdown in consumer spending hits travel budgets, a shift that could weigh on oil prices in the months ahead.】

item.title: RWE 未能打消 Calpine 并购猜测，股价跌幅扩大
item.description: 德国电力集团（RWE）管理层未能消除投资者对该公司可能收购美国一家燃气发电厂运营商的报道的担忧，周三该公司股价跌幅扩大。【原文：RWE shares extended losses on Wednesday after the group's management failed to dispel investor concerns about a report that the company could buy into a U.S. operator of gas-fired power plants.】

item.title: 瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar 开始在美国生产，避免了高额关税
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车（EV）制造商Polestar周三表示，它已开始在美国生产Polestar 3 SUV，从而在避免对中国产汽车征收重大关税方面又迈进了一步。【原文：Swedish electric-vehicle (EV) maker Polestar moved one step further in avoiding major tariffs imposed on Chinese-made cars on Wednesday when the automaker said it began production of its Polestar 3 SUV in the United States.】

item.title: M&M's 糖果制造商玛氏将以 360 亿美元收购品客母公司 Kellanova
item.description: 家族拥有的包装食品巨头玛氏公司（旗下糖果品牌包括 M&M's 和士力架）周三表示，将以近 360 亿美元的价格收购品客（Pringles）生产商 Kellanova，这是包装食品行业最大的一笔交易。【原文：Family-owned packaged food giant Mars, whose candy brands include M&M's and Snickers, said on Wednesday it would buy Pringles maker Kellanova for nearly $36 billion in the biggest deal in the packaged food sector.】

item.title: 去中心化人工智能网络 Sahara 在三星支持的新一轮融资中获得新资金
item.description: 集区块链和人工智能于一体的初创企业撒哈拉人工智能公司（Sahara AI）周三表示，该公司在一轮融资中筹集了4300万美元，领投方为风险投资者Pantera Capital、Binance Labs和Polychain Capital。【原文：Sahara AI, a startup integrating the blockchain and artificial intelligence, said on Wednesday it raised $43 million in a funding round led by venture capital investors Pantera Capital, Binance Labs and Polychain Capital.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司和夏威夷航空公司将拟议交易的审查期延长一天
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Air）周三表示，已同意将以 19 亿美元收购同行夏威夷控股公司（Hawaiian Holdings）的审查期延长一天。【原文：Alaska Air said on Wednesday it had agreed to extend by a day the review period of its proposed $1.9 billion acquisition of peer Hawaiian Holdings .】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局结束对 180 万辆丰田 SUV 的初步调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，已结束对约 180 万辆丰田 RAV4 SUV 电池终端短路问题的初步调查。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday that it closed a preliminary investigation into about 1.8 million Toyota RAV4 SUVs over concerns related to short circuits in battery terminals.】

item.title: 华尔街老板对总统候选人特朗普和哈里斯的看法
item.description: 民主党总统候选人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）和共和党竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 11 月的总统大选前展开了激烈的角逐，华尔街的一些人正在选边站。以下是我们了解到的华尔街一些顶级老板的倾向。【原文：Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris and Republican rival Donald Trump are locked in a tight race ahead of the November presidential election and some on Wall Street are picking sides. Here's what we know about how some of Wall Street's top bosses are leaning.】

item.title: 经济放缓，美国垃圾债投资者对杠杆贷款持谨慎态度
item.description: 在过去一周市场企稳后，杠杆贷款交易有望回升，不过一些投资者表示，如果经济疲软，他们对垃圾级贷款持谨慎态度。【原文：Leveraged loan deals are expected to pick back up after a stabilization in markets over the past week, although some investors say they are cautious about junk-rated loans if the economy weakens.】

item.title: 早间新闻美国清除通胀障碍，新西兰意外降息
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 以直面危机著称的资深快餐业高管接手星巴克
item.description: 今年早些时候，卷饼制造商奇波特尔（Chipotle）因所谓的缩小分量而在社交媒体上遭到抨击，首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）做出了惊人的承认：批评该公司的人说得有道理。【原文：When burrito maker Chipotle came under fire on social media for supposedly shrinking portion sizes earlier this year, CEO Brian Niccol made a striking admission: the company's critics had a point.】

item.title: 面对更严格的监管，度假租赁业加大游说力度
item.description: 度假租赁业加大了对美国立法者施加影响的力度，以阻止更多的城市颁布对短期租赁的限制措施，从而回应人们对住房供应和生活质量的担忧。【原文：The vacation rental industry has stepped up efforts to influence U.S. lawmakers to keep more cities from enacting restrictions on short-term rentals in response to concerns about housing availability and quality of life.】
